data.title: BMV: Contact
data.meta_description: Need some help or answers? Customers may speak to one of our customer service folks by calling at 888-692-6841 Monday through Friday 8:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m. (EST).
data.text:
Need some help or answers?

While we are experiencing high call and email volumes, you can review our FAQ section first to find answers to your questions.

Review Our FAQs

You can also review our How-To Guides to learn how to complete transactions online at myBMV.com.

View the How-To Guides

Phone

Customer Contact Center:

888-692-6841

Hours:

Customer associates available Mon. through Fri. 8 a.m. - 6 p.m. (EDT)

Automated Integrated Voice Response (IVR) available 24/7

Email

Send an Email to the BMV

Because of the volume of messages we receive, please expect a response in 7 to 10 business days, Monday - Friday.

U.S. Mail

Indiana Government Center North

Room 402

100 North Senate Avenue

Indianapolis, IN 46204

Services Provided by Customer Service Associates

Customer service associates will provide help with the following during business hours:

Suspensions

Titles

Credentials

Registrations

Branch Location and Services Provided

Scheduling of Skills Exams

myBMV Account Resets

Services Provided by the Automated Integrated Voice Response (IVR)

The IVR will provide information on the following:

Branch Locations and Hours (Provided by entering Zip Code)

Status of Drivers License, Vehicle Registration, or License Plate (requires Indiana Drivers License Number, last four numbers of Social Security Number and Zip Code that BMV has on file for you)

Payment of Fees (Reinstatement, Renew Registration Requires PIN on your mailed registration or current PIN is also available online with myBMV.com account)

Driver Records and/or Suspensions

Document Requirements (provided by text message or verbally over the phone)

Speak with a representative (available during business hours only)
